timestamp: I feel like I'm still discovering the best way to communicate mental motility using this tool.
And it seems to going to be this way for a long time.
I think keeping one key pressed while on a trin of though can be useful to differentiate it from a sudden and short thought that simply passes.

key: pressing j only after three mindful exhalations might make that signal more meaningful
comment: because is pretty common to try to return to a centered state using the breathing just to be carried away immediately in the next.

timestamp: The sure must be some kind of tradition that uses drawing in some way to make this exercise.
